title: How to Make a Gluten Free Pizza and Mix

steps.headline: Mix all the ingredients in the pizza mix recipe together.
Store in an airtight container until ready to use.
When ready to make pizza preheat oven to 375 °F (191 °C).
Dissolve your yeast in lukewarm water.
Put pizza mix, yeast/water mixture, honey, olive oil, and lemon juice into a bowl.
Mix well, make sure there is no mix stuck to the sides of your bowl in clumps.
Press into a twelve-inch pizza pan or 9 by 13" baking dish.
Cook for 10-20 minutes or until golden brown.

text: Mix all the ingredients in the pizza mix recipe together.  Store in an airtight container until ready to use.  When ready to make pizza preheat oven to 375 °F (191 °C).  Dissolve your yeast in lukewarm water.  Put pizza mix, yeast/water mixture, honey, olive oil, and lemon juice into a bowl.  Mix well, make sure there is no mix stuck to the sides of your bowl in clumps.  Press into a twelve-inch pizza pan or 9 by 13" baking dish.  Cook for 10-20 minutes or until golden brown.  Finished.
